title: Player Database for Oceanic Gamers: Oceanic Gaming

embed.description: The player database is to serve as a way for players interested in playing to reach out to other individuals wanting to play in tournaments.

body:
Our project is designed to help individual players find teammates or get automatically put into teams of 5 to compete in tournaments. We will look at certain attributes such as rank and city to help pair you with the right individuals.
This is also a precursor to our Inter-City League.
-----------------------------------
Use the first link to signup to our database:
https://goo.gl/forms/ibOyL9SQFh6aYEFF2

All signups are displayed here:
https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1Rw46-Byex4-STqXJbymPMjqxCbPzQSK19mCnkdorG5I/edit?usp=sharing

Find us on Discord: https://discord.gg/AmzZMrq
